TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed SynchronizationOption extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定元件要求的自動同步處理類型。

span.span: Specifies the type of automatic synchronization requested by the component.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the type. [!code-cpp[EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption#0](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption/cpp/class1.cpp#0)] [!code-csharp[EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption/CS/class1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/EnterpriseServicesSynchronizationOption/VB/class1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption Disabled = int32(0)

summary.span: COM+ 在決定物件的內容時會忽略元件的同步處理需求。

span.span: COM+ ignores the synchronization requirements of the component when determining context for the object.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption NotSupported = int32(1)

summary.span: 具有這個值的物件從不參與同步處理，不論其呼叫端的狀態如何。

span.span: An object with this value never participates in synchronization, regardless of the status of its caller.

summary.span: 這個設定只供非交易元件使用，並且不使用 Just-In-Time (JIT) 啟動過程 (Activation)。

span.span: This setting is only available for components that are non-transactional and do not use just-in-time (JIT) activation.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption Required = int32(3)

summary.span: 確保所有從元件建立的物件都會同步化。

span.span: Ensures that all objects created from the component are synchronized.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption RequiresNew = int32(4)

summary.span: 具有這個值的物件必須參與新的同步處理，其中 COM+ 將代表涉及呼叫的所有元件來管理內容和 Apartment。

span.span: An object with this value must participate in a new synchronization where COM+ manages contexts and apartments on behalf of all components involved in the call.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.EnterpriseServices.SynchronizationOption Supported = int32(2)

summary.span: 如果它存在的話，具有這個值的物件會參與同步處理。

span.span: An object with this value participates in synchronization, if it exists.
